mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CheckList( check_id, room_name, room_address1, room_address2, room_deposit, room_expense, room_size, room_star, room_description, room_filname, room_check1, room_check2, room_check3, room_check4, room_check5, room_check6) VALUES ( CheckList_seq.nextval, #{check_id}, #{room_name}, #{room_address1}, #{room_address2}, #{room_deposit}, #{room_expense}, #{room_size}, #{room_star}, #{room_description}, #{room_filname}, #{room_check1}, #{room_check2}, #{room_check3}, #{room_check4}, #{room_check5}, #{room_check6})
